title: Great App!
text:
Facebook keeps me connected to my family and friends! It also helps me to get information out about my business and promotes the safety of the country! Facebook is a wonderful tool to use and positive uplifting and empowering ways! When used as a marketing tool, and a tool to create, Facebook can definitely be top-tier! I thank Facebook for the abilities to stay connected, informed, and engaged with the city, schools, and resources available, when properly searched and used correctly!

Just like any other app, it needs to be updated and stay current, but I think it‚Äôs an all-around great app!

title: Privacy? I don‚Äôt think so.
text: The app does everything in its power to stay running or signed in at all times. It is easy to mis-tap ‚ÄúSave password‚Äù. When really you never would do that with a social media application. We need those ‚Äústay here!‚Äù options to not be so engrossed in this faulty product(glitches CONSTANTLY). Meta products in general. Bad security(allowing the ex-president who caused a riot, back on all platforms) and privacy measures for individuals. Download and delete. Don't waste your energy warding off the spam you'll get.

title: Walking with comfort again
text: I am so grateful to have found Dr. Mini! I have a 16 1/2 year old 45 pound Elks hound mix with severe hind leg muscle loss and arthritis. I am amazed at how chiropractic adjustments help her walk so much better and more pain free. She was falling a lot and it makes sense at her age falls would put her out of alignment. Everyone who sees her getting around is impressed and I credit that to Dr. Mini‚Äôs adjustments.

title: Cannot Login IOS Facebook for iPad Since 3-5-24 Global Outage
text:
I haven't been able to login IOS Facebook App on my 5th Gen. iPad since the 3-5-24 the FB/IG global outage, even with cleared data & cookies, it doesn't recognize my user & pass & asks me to "try again", though I can use the very same user & pass to login Facebook from all of my other devices.

Even with looks to be security updates, it's the same issue, I must use either Safari or Chrome IOS browsers to login my FB, I haven't read of any other uses having this particular issue.
